== Moorkkanad (627508) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Moorkkanad is a village in the [[Perinthalmanna]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 3064 hectares and harbouring 6944 households with total population of 36324 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Perinthalmanna]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 17165 and female population is 19159. Scheduled Caste Population is 3121 and Scheduled Tribes population is 89. Census Location Code of the village is 627508<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 28931 (79.65%)
* Literate male population: 13824 (80.54%)
* Literate female population: 15107 (78.85%)
